name: Vektor Byte - Level 3 and Level 4 DEMO
name_original: Vektor Byte - Level 3 and Level 4 DEMO
description:
Vektor Byte Demo. 

PC only, Windows 7 upwards recommended. Joypad Required.

Levels 3 and 4 are in the demo, the game will feature 10 levels of varying graphical styles. These 2 levels are set in a post apocalyptic world, where the digital ship is battling human and mutant enemies. 

7 Levels are now almost complete in the development and ideas for levels 8, 9 and 10 are in progress.

1 and 2 - Digital Domain.

3 and 4 and 5 - Human Warzone.

6 - 8bit and 16bit computer systems.

7 - Set on Mars.

8 - TBC

9 - TBC

10 - TBC

Enjoy the demo. All music, graphics and sound effects are custom (Unless I missed something.)

Created using SHMUP Creator from Bulo Studio, with a little help from Game Guru Classic. 

All soundtracks and sound effects created using Novation Ultranova, Waldorf Blofeld and Roland JD08 Hardware synths. 

Fantastic software synths were from Cherry Audio and include, CA2600, DCO-106, Dreamsynth, Eight Voice, Memorymode, Mercury-4, Polymode, PS-20, Quadra, Surrealistic MG-1 and the mighty Voltage Modular. 

Bulo Studio.
